courses.name:
Magick.Me:
The Adept Initiative I & II
courses.heading:
Free Yourself Spiritually. Free Yourself Materially. Free Yourself to Live Your Passion.

Adept Initiative I: January 6 - February 14, 2025.
Adept Initiative II: March 16 - April 25, 2025.
courses.description: This first-of-its-kind Megacourse leverages the greatest spiritual tools available to humanity to liberate, empower and awaken you to your innate freedom and true purpose in life‚Äîand provisions you with the tools you need to fulfill that purpose. Now. No New Age silliness. No wishful thinking. No dogma. Just raw, effective technique, backed by science and practical experience.
courses.author: Jason Louv

hero.announcement: Limited Time: Join the Ultimate Mega-Training in Real World Results Magick

upsell.text: Like you, I live in the real world‚Äînot some far-off, wishful-thinking paradise. The first step of spiritual liberation is material and financial liberation. You can't effectively meditate, let alone help anybody, if you're worried about keeping the lights on. That's why this course gets you financially free first.

topThree.title: The Adept Initiative is back. And it's better than ever.
topThree.subtitle: Two Life-Changing Programs, One Ultimate Goal: Your Total Transformation
topThree.description: Join us for a completely revamped, updated version of our most powerful course ever, taught live online from January to April 2025. Whether you're new or returning, this is an entirely new experience designed to reconnect you with your true self and give you the tools for real-world mastery.

features.name: ADEPT INITIATIVE I: MASTER THE PHYSICAL WORLD
features.description: Learn to master the physical world through financial techniques and powerful tools that have helped many students achieve wealth and success. Get everything you need to become a real magician, while building a solid foundation for your life.

features.name: ADEPT INITIATIVE II: MASTER THE SPIRITUAL WORLD
features.description: Experience deep spiritual mastery through astral excursions to all Sephiroth and paths on the Tree of Life. Learn advanced ceremonial magic methods to explore and master the magical world, with techniques rarely offered to the public.

features.name: LIVE INTERACTIVE EXPERIENCE & COMMUNITY
features.description: Get daily video lessons, live Q&As, and join our private community platform. Connect with practitioners worldwide, get personalized guidance (VIP level), and learn at your own pace with lifetime access to all materials.

promoVideo.title: Get a Glimpse into Your Transformational Journey
promoVideo.subtitle: Watch the course preview and see what awaits you in The Adept Initiative I & II.

cards.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
cards.description: Two Powerful Programs for Complete Transformation

units.name: Adept I: Module 1 - Awakening the Inner Adept
units.description: At the outset of the work, the student will begin to build their elemental circle (with inner Tao), select its location, prepare ritual garments, acquire elemental tools and record, and select a magical name and motto for the duration of the course. Next, the aspirant will begin to master their physical health and vitality, definitively build their map of the universe and their place in it, and solidly root and anchor themselves within life. They will master their finances, designing the next steps for their career and implementing long-term strategies for both active and passive wealth creation. They will also begin to employ the strategies of practical magic to achieve their goals, including visualization, trance induction, astral work and lucid dreaming.

units.name: Adept I: Module 2 - Building the Foundation
units.description: At the outset of the work, the student will begin to build their elemental circle (with inner Tao), select its location, prepare ritual garments, acquire elemental tools and record, and select a magical name and motto for the duration of the course. Next, the aspirant will begin to master their physical health and vitality, definitively build their map of the universe and their place in it, and solidly root and anchor themselves within life. They will master their finances, designing the next steps for their career and implementing long-term strategies for both active and passive wealth creation. They will also begin to employ the strategies of practical magic to achieve their goals, including visualization, trance induction, astral work and lucid dreaming.

units.name: Adept I: Module 3 - Harmonizing Inner & Outer Worlds
units.description: While the aspirant will have been working on their rational and logic mind in Air, here they will deepen their ability to immerse themselves in their intuitive faculties. To do so, they will gain a mastery of trance and visionary state induction, and work with ancient divinatory systems like the Tarot and I Ching to build a bridge to their non-linguistic, intuitive mind. Here they will also begin getting into the ‚Äúhard coding‚Äù of their life, reviewing the heady world of past lives, karma and astrological templating.

units.name: Adept I: Module 4 - Mastery of Mind and Energy
units.description: With new understanding of self gained, the aspirant will now clearly and definitively state their ultimate Will for their life, and massively strengthen their daily reserve of willpower and decisiveness. And unlike other systems, which completely overlook this step, they will also learn how to both check that this Will is congruent with their deep psychology and their environment, but they will also learn to bind the opposite, as no force can be invoked without also invoking its equal and opposing force. We will also do immense work on resolving internal conflicts‚Äîthe competing desires that produce self-sabotage‚Äîso that the road forward opens and remains open. Now, at last, we will put the full heft of magical, mystical and gnostic techniques into manifesting your Will into reality. Finally, and most importantly, we assess the role of relationship, and conscious relationships as the most important spiritual practice of all.

units.name: Adept I: Module 5 - Integration and Transformation
units.description: With the four elements now working properly as a balanced wheel carrying you forward into the future, we will now work on techniques for linking your temporal personality with your transcendent, spiritual self, your Self Beyond Self, that which lies beyond the small-s self. To do so, we will combine all previous techniques and accelerate them with the higher rungs of yoga‚ÄîPratyahara, Dharana, Dhyana and Samadhi‚Äîallowing you to make your life singularly focused and spiritualized.

units.name: Adept II: Module 1 - The Ceremonial Journey
units.description: Access the transformative power of ceremonial magic through our comprehensive system. Master the use of magical tools and symbols, learn essential safety protocols, and enhance your sacred space for advanced work. Includes our exclusive guide to ethical power cultivation that protects while you progress.

units.name: Adept II: Module 2 - Navigating Astral Planes
units.description: Master safe and effective astral projection with our proven methodology. Develop powerful visualization abilities, learn essential protection techniques, and map the inner planes with confidence. Includes our comprehensive astral safety system and integration practices for bringing back valuable insights.

units.name: Adept II: Module 3 - The Pathworking Paradigm
units.description: Access the transformative power of magical pathworking through our structured system. Master the language of symbols and archetypes, experience guided inner journeys, and learn advanced interpretation techniques. This module provides the keys to profound personal transformation.

units.name: Adept II: Module 4 - Mastery of Ceremonial Practices
units.description: Design and execute powerful magical ceremonies with confidence. Master elemental and planetary forces, learn advanced evocation and invocation techniques, and develop expertise in energy raising and direction. Includes our proven system for ethical manifestation.

units.name: Adept II: Module 5 - Integration and Ascension
units.description: Create your unique magical framework synthesizing all advanced practices. Develop long-term mastery plans, learn leadership skills for guiding others, and participate in our powerful graduation ritual. Emerge as a fully empowered magical practitioner ready to shape reality.

testimonials.quote: I feel that with this course, I have found and built an objective foundation for positive thinking that makes sense and is practical and doesn't feel like a coping mechanism or wishful thinking. I have been able to recognize when I do not pay attention, or disassociate. My conversations are better. I work more effectively. I do not overwhelm and shut down like I used to. My habits are far more positive. The mental states I am reaching are sublime in my most mundane moments of the day. I feel people are opening up more, because I am far less guarded, and open up more myself. I have dealt with some of the most debilitating anxiety and claustrophobia for a while, but most certainly these past three years. These tools you have provided have been the only effective thing to not only stop these episodes, but prevent them entirely. Make no mistake, you are saving lives with this school. Negativity in my life has become malleable, instead of a death sentence. I love what I have learned, and only regret that the course is over. You will be seeing my name in future courses guaranteed. I cannot thank you enough. I really feel that I struck gold. Exceptionally happy and grateful for this material. Thank you.
testimonials.author: Shea A.

testimonials.quote: The pre-course publicity for The Adept Initiative said something like "this course will change your life". I read it and laughed and thought, yeah, great marketing. Can you guess what happened next? I started the course, and by day two it had already changed my life. So don't hesitate to sign up for Jason's courses. He keeps his promises.
testimonials.author: MF
testimonials.title: Writer

testimonials.quote: Truly the most return for the money I have ever gotten. No woo-woo at all, just hours of disciplined activity, focused effort and hard questions to ask and answer yourself. I recommend the school to you if you are ready to give everything and want to discover what it is you want and how to get it. Jason packs the classes with valuable information and you can wring the juice out of them and into your own life. He really knows magick without being ungrounded or cryptic, and he makes himself available to his students completely and answers questions thoroughly. This class is especially useful to artists, musicians and anyone who has to blaze their own trail. Or anyone that wants to get to the core of their reality.
testimonials.author: Christian
testimonials.title: Electrician

testimonials.quote: I am a professional musician and business owner, and can say without a doubt that The Adept Initiative has truly changed my life. Taking this class has been one of the best decisions I have made for my life in recent memory. I especially appreciate the straightforward, no bullshit delivery Jason gives with each and every unit. I have been floundering in occult practice for a few years now, hungry for spiritual growth, yet missing the target continually. Well now, through this class, I have found my aim.
testimonials.author: Daniel P.
testimonials.title: Musician and Business Owner

testimonials.quote: The Adept Initiative Course blew my mind. Jason went above and beyond in this course, and I can't recommend going on this journey enough! At the start of this course, I was stuck in an apartment I didn't want to be in and work that wasn't fulfilling. At the end of six weeks I was able to move out and find a new beautiful apartment, and expanded my business to something that now fills my heart. Thank you for all your hard work and effort. It is treasured.
testimonials.author: Brian G.
testimonials.title: Teacher and Mindset Coach

testimonials.quote: This course is the best value for dollar purchase I've ever made. Buying the Adept Initiative was like paying for a cheap plane ticket only to find yourself on a first class rocketship ride that changes you as a person. The content is easily understood and a joy to watch. It is magick grounded in history, made practical. The course as a whole is the closest thing I've had to a reality warping experience without drugs. If you have an interest in any of the material in the Adept Initiative, it will deliver beyond your expectations and more. Cannot recommend it enough.
testimonials.author: Joseph C.
testimonials.title: Personal Trainer

testimonials.quote: The Adept Initiative radically altered my life and sparked spiritual growth! Jason guides students through this profound collection of occult teachings, texts and exercises working towards personal empowerment, deep reflection, alignment and balance within interior and exterior worlds! This course has renewed my passion and vigor for life, art and creation and has refocused every aspect of my life towards living my True Will! I would recommend this course to anyone seeking enlightenment, growth or direction in life. Jason lays a framework for every adept to take charge of their own path and make real and lasting change! I am so grateful for this course and for Jason Louv, master magician, sage and scholar.
testimonials.author: Bjorn O.
testimonials.title: Artist and Maker

testimonials.quote: As a young adult, Jason gave me the resources and techniques to truly grow as a person on my unique spiritual path. The information was given in a direct manner with all of the necessary preliminaries, true compassion, and the ultimate pursuit of the deepest truths as he knows them. I am truly privileged to have been given these tools so close to the start of my path. Forever grateful.
testimonials.author: Landen W.
testimonials.title: Full-time student

testimonials.quote: The Adept Initiative absolutely revitalized my life. Everything from my meditation to my finances and even the way I paint has completely turned on its head for the better. I feel grounded. Rooted. Energized. My interactions with people have shifted. My willpower has increased astronomically. I listen better. I know what to say and when to say it. I know silence in all things. Take this course. Listen to the lectures. Do ALL the daily and weekly exercises. Buy a meditation bench! Commit 100%, and It will change you on a fundamental level.
testimonials.author: Andr√©s Z.
testimonials.title: Artist

testimonials.quote: Cut through the unnecessary and remove the excess. This class allows you to see clearly and think lucidly about why and for what are you here. I've walked in the general direction aimlessly for quite sometime but only after this course, this instruction, this lesson, was I actually able to walk on the narrow dedicated path towards fulfillment. Truly if you feel scattered or want to find your purpose, this class is it. Jason provides world class instruction and only teaches what works. No fluff.
testimonials.author: Jose
testimonials.title: Medical

testimonials.quote: I laughed, I cried, and at some point during the course I suddenly realized that my life can and will never be the same, as a direct result of Jason Louv's highly opinionated and not-fucking-around introduction to magic. Do your self (and the world) a favor, sign up already!
testimonials.author: George T.

testimonials.quote: The course is an excellent primer for anyone interested in magick and self mastery. If you do the work and hold yourself to being honest, you will have no choice but to make progress in every aspect of your life. It's been like a thunderbolt to my development.
testimonials.author: Anthony B.

testimonials.quote: Just finished the last lesson. I felt compelled to make this post. The value that Jason Louv has provided in this course is beyond anything I have seen in the magical community, and in academia thus far. I have been in the training and education profession for over a decade. The compendium of knowledge and supplementary material that Jason has assembled is only rivaled by the highest echelon of academic providers. The integration of technology; I.e. biofeedback tools, web based analytics, and Ubiquitous/Blended Learning techniques to extend the classroom beyond the traditional setting are all hallmarks of an instructor that understands how to truly integrate the course material into a highly impactful class which benefits from the best technological tools available. Beyond that, the amount of contact hours, time on required tasks, and availability for student question and answer sessions should not be taken for granted. In summary, this course is a steal for the price and I will whole heartedly sign up for the follow on. Love and good Magick all.
testimonials.author: Drew P

testimonials.quote: This course assisted me to gain better traction on my life via clear and direct constructive methods.
testimonials.author: Sarel
testimonials.title: Property Manager

testimonials.quote: This course assisted me to gain better traction on my life via clear and direct constructive methods.
testimonials.author: Heather Nichols
testimonials.title: (Not Provided)

curriculum_head.title: I bring you fire.
curriculum_head.description: This course takes the Western esoteric training systems of the past and updates them for the hyperconnected, disintegrative 21st century. Rather than lament this change, I have chosen to make full use of its capabilities to provide the best possible quality esoteric instruction to the greatest possible number of students‚Äîstudents who can meet and practice together virtually from all over the entire planet, a truly unprecedented situation never before possible at any other time in world history.

curriculum_features.name: Waking Up
curriculum_features.description: How to wake up, liberate yourself both spiritually and financially, and become a change agent

curriculum_features.name: Self-Empowerment
curriculum_features.description: You'll get the best tools in the world for self-empowerment, mastering your life, and achieving spiritual fulfillment‚Äîin any environment, no matter what the condition of the world is

curriculum_features.name: Brain Change
curriculum_features.description: How to enhance your intelligence and daily joy with the most potent brain change techniques of Eastern yoga and Western mysticism

curriculum_features.name: Survival Skills
curriculum_features.description: How to not only survive our chaotic and fragmented world, but thrive in it. (A task that will only get harder with the coming of automation, massive job loss and economic recession. Are you prepared?)

curriculum_features.name: Leadership & Influence
curriculum_features.description: How to become a competent and empowered leader, and chart a course for yourself and others in a rudderless world with no working maps or models

curriculum_features.name: Karmic Overhaul
curriculum_features.description: How to free yourself by reducing your karmic footprint‚Äîstopping what goes around so that it doesn't come around

features: Master Advanced Magickal Practices‚ÄîMove beyond basics and delve into advanced rituals and ceremonies
Personal Growth and Self-Mastery‚ÄîTransform internal blocks into strengths and achieve profound personal growth
Exclusive Community Access‚ÄîNetwork with elite practitioners and build lasting magickal connections
Lifetime Access and Continuous Updates‚ÄîEnjoy lifetime access to course materials with free updates
Certification and Accreditation‚ÄîReceive official certification upon completion, recognized by leading institutions

featured_teacher.title: Meet Your Guide: Jason Louv
featured_teacher.description:
An experienced explorer of consciousness ready to ignite your transformation.


One of humanity's best mutant scouts on the frontiers of human experience.

‚Äì R. U. Sirius, counterculture legend


Jason Louv [is] in the top tier of new esoteric writers.

‚Äì Brendan McCarthy, artist, designer and cowriter of Mad Max: Fury Road
featured_teacher.name: Jason Louv
featured_teacher.bio:
Jason Louv is a bestselling author and spiritual educator with over 25 years of experience delving into the world's sacred traditions. From Eastern enlightenment practices to Western magick, Jason has immersed himself in diverse paths to uncover what truly empowers and transforms lives.

Not just a theorist, Jason has walked the walk. He's distilled his vast knowledge into practical teachings, stripping away superstition to deliver effective tools for personal evolution. His work has been featured in the Tetragrammaton With Rick Rubin, Duncan Trussell Family Hour and Team Human With Douglas Rushkoff podcasts, Smithsonian Magazine, VICE Creators Project, Dazed Digital, and even the #1 Netflix show The Midnight Gospel.

Jason isn't about being a guru on a pedestal. He's a fellow traveler who understands the struggles and triumphs of the transformative journey. His mission is to equip you with the spiritual technologies needed to unlock your highest potential and navigate the complexities of modern life with clarity and purpose.

charity_donation.title: Transform Yourself, Transform the World
charity_donation.description: 10% of your enrollment will be donated to the Polaris Project, combating human trafficking and modern-day slavery.

pricing_plans.description: Includes group coaching and bonus modules

pricing_plans.name: VIP Access - $997
pricing_plans.description: Get exclusive 1-on-1 coaching and personalized tools

related_posts.title: Thriving in Chaos: Strategies for Success in Turbulent Times
related_posts.excerpt: Discover powerful techniques to navigate and excel in chaotic environments, turning crisis into opportunity.

related_posts.title: The Art of Alchemical Transformation in Daily Life
related_posts.excerpt: Learn how to apply ancient alchemical principles to transform your everyday challenges into golden opportunities.

curriculum_sections.title:
The Adept Initiative I:
Foundation of Power
curriculum_sections.description: Master the core elements of Western magick, updated for the digital age. This isn't your grandfather's mystery school‚Äîit's a cutting-edge fusion of ancient wisdom and modern technology. You'll master the elemental forces that shape your life, following the legendary training systems of the Golden Dawn and Franz Bardon, but turbocharged for the 21st century. Connect with fellow initiates worldwide in our virtual temple, and transform your life from the ground up.

units.name: Module 1: Awakening the Inner Adept
units.description: Build your magical foundation from the ground up. Create your elemental circle, choose your magical name, and establish your sacred space. Master practical techniques for physical vitality, financial abundance, and life mastery. Learn visualization, trance work, and astral projection to achieve your goals with surgical precision.

units.name: Module 2: Building the Foundation
units.description: Strip away what doesn't serve you. Master authentic Raja Yoga from initiatory Vedic and Tibetan sources‚Äînot the watered-down gym variety. Develop razor-sharp critical thinking to cut through spiritual BS. Perfect your control over body and emotions through advanced Asana and Pranayama practices.

units.name: Module 3: Harmonizing Inner & Outer Worlds
units.description: Dive deep into your intuitive powers. Master trance and visionary states while learning ancient divination systems like Tarot and I Ching. Explore past lives, karma, and astrological influences to understand your soul's blueprint and rewrite your destiny.

units.name: Module 4: Mastery of Mind and Energy
units.description: Discover and manifest your True Will. Learn to resolve internal conflicts and eliminate self-sabotage. Master advanced magical and mystical techniques for reality manipulation. Transform your relationships into powerful spiritual catalysts for growth.

units.name: Module 5: Integration and Transformation
units.description: Unite your temporal and transcendent selves through advanced yogic practices‚ÄîPratyahara, Dharana, Dhyana, and Samadhi. Transform your entire life into a focused spiritual operation, achieving states of consciousness beyond ordinary reality.

curriculum_sections.title:
The Adept Initiative II:
Advanced Mastery
curriculum_sections.description: Enter the heart of Western ceremonial magic. Master the Tree of Life through direct experience, working with divine forces and spirits in a structured, safe environment. Learn advanced ritual techniques previously reserved for high-degree initiates, while being guided through the cosmic architecture itself. This isn't theoretical study‚Äîit's hands-on training in high magic, combining group ceremony with individual practice.

units.name: Module 1: Foundations of High Magic
units.description: Set up your advanced magical workspace and master core ceremonial tools. Learn Golden Dawn-style circle casting, banishing rituals, and protection techniques. Develop your subtle energy body and strengthen your aura for advanced operations.

units.name: Module 2: The Art of Astral Temple Craft
units.description: Master astral projection and inner plane navigation. Build your astral temple as a permanent base for magical operations. Learn to interact safely with entities while maintaining awareness across multiple reality levels.

units.name: Module 3: Paths of Power
units.description: Journey through the Tree of Life via structured pathworking. Master Hebrew letters, elemental forces, and planetary energies. Create talismans and forge relationships with archetypal forces while maintaining solid grounding practices.

units.name: Module 4: Advanced Ceremonial Operations
units.description: Conduct advanced evocation and invocation of spirits. Master ceremonial ritual work, divine names, and astrological timing. Begin communication with higher forces while maintaining proper magical records and boundaries.

units.name: Module 5: Synthesis and Transcendence
units.description: Design and execute complex magical operations. Master advanced Tree of Life work, including the supernal triangles and Da'ath. Create your own rituals and work with egregores. Graduate through a powerful group ceremony as a fully capable ceremonial magician.
